action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

#Install Basic plugins
sudo curl -o batch-install-jenkins-plugins.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ideadevice/calm-public-lib/master/Calm-Blueprints/Jenkins/batch-install-jenkins-plugins.sh
sudo chmod +x batch-install-jenkins-plugins.sh
echo 'credentials-binding
windows-slaves
ssh-credentials 
ssh-slaves
credentials
plain-credentials
credentials-binding
authentication-tokens
pam-auth
script-security
cloudbees-folder
cloudbees-credentials' | sudo tee plugins

if [[ "@@{INSTALL_BLUEOCEAN}@@" == "yes" ]];then
  echo 'blueocean' | sudo tee -a plugins
fi
sudo systemctl stop jenkins 
sudo ./batch-install-jenkins-plugins.sh -p plugins -d /var/lib/jenkins/plugins
sudo systemctl start jenkins 
sleep 60
IFS='.' read -r -a array <<< "@@{JENKINS_VERSION}@@"

if [[ "${array[0]}" -gt "1" ]];then
  echo "Initial admin password is"
  sudo cat /var/lib/jenkins/secrets/initialAdminPassword
fi

#!/bin/bash

echo "authpwd="$(sudo cat /var/lib/jenkins/secrets/initialAdminPassword)

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

#Download jenkins-cli
sudo yum -y install wget
sudo wget http://@@{Jenkins_Master.address}@@:8080/jnlpJars/jenkins-cli.jar

#!/bin/bash


JENKINS_URL=http://@@{Jenkins_Master.address}@@:8080
NODE_NAME=@@{address}@@
NODE_SLAVE_HOME='/home/centos'
EXECUTORS=1
SSH_PORT=22
CRED_ID=Jenkins_Slave
LABELS=build
USERID=admin

echo "Creating credential"

#Create credential
echo '<com.cloudbees.jenkins.plugins.sshcredentials.impl.BasicSSHUserPrivateKey plugin="ssh-credentials@1.13">
  <scope>GLOBAL</scope>
  <id>Jenkins_Slave</id>
  <description></description>
  <username>@@{centos.username}@@</username>
  <privateKeySource class="com.cloudbees.jenkins.plugins.sshcredentials.impl.BasicSSHUserPrivateKey$DirectEntryPrivateKeySource">
    <privateKey>
    @@{centos.secret}@@
    </privateKey>
  </privateKeySource>
</com.cloudbees.jenkins.plugins.sshcredentials.impl.BasicSSHUserPrivateKey>' | sudo java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s ${JENKINS_URL}  create-credentials-by-xml system::system::jenkins _ --username ${USERID}  --password @@{Jenkins_Master.authpwd}@@


echo "Creating slave node"

#Create Slave Node
cat <<EOF | sudo java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s ${JENKINS_URL} create-node ${NODE_NAME} --username ${USERID} --password @@{Jenkins_Master.authpwd}@@
<slave>
  <name>${NODE_NAME}</name>
  <description></description>
  <remoteFS>${NODE_SLAVE_HOME}</remoteFS>
  <numExecutors>${EXECUTORS}</numExecutors>
  <mode>NORMAL</mode>
  <retentionStrategy class="hudson.slaves.RetentionStrategy$Always"/>
  <launcher class="hudson.plugins.sshslaves.SSHLauncher" plugin="ssh-slaves@1.21">
    <host>${NODE_NAME}</host>
    <port>${SSH_PORT}</port>
    <credentialsId>${CRED_ID}</credentialsId>
    <maxNumRetries>0</maxNumRetries>
    <retryWaitTime>0</retryWaitTime>
    <sshHostKeyVerificationStrategy class="hudson.plugins.sshslaves.verifiers.NonVerifyingKeyVerificationStrategy"/>
  </launcher>
  <label>${LABELS}</label>
  <nodeProperties/>
</slave>
EOF

action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y @@{CENTOS_PACKAGE}@@
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64

sudo rpm --import http://pkg.jenkins-ci.org/redhat-stable/jenkins-ci.org.key
sudo curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/jenkins.repo http://pkg.jenkins-ci.org/redhat-stable/jenkins.repo
sudo yum install -y jenkins-@@{JENKINS_VERSION}@@
sudo systemctl enable jenkins
sudo systemctl start jenkins
#sudo systemctl disable firewalld
#sudo systemctl stop firewalld

#!/bin/bash

echo "Uninstalling jenkins"

sudo systemctl stop jenkins
sudo systemctl disable jenkins
sudo yum -y remove jenkins-@@{JENKINS_VERSION}@@

#Download jenkins-cli
sudo yum -y install wget
sudo wget http://@@{Jenkins_Master.address}@@:8080/jnlpJars/jenkins-cli.jar

#!/bin/bash


JENKINS_URL=http://@@{Jenkins_Master.address}@@:8080

#Create credential

  <scope>GLOBAL</scope>
  <id>Jenkins_Slave</id>
  <description></description>

  <privateKeySource class="com.cloudbees.jenkins.plugins.sshcredentials.impl.BasicSSHUserPrivateKey$DirectEntryPrivateKeySource">
    <privateKey>
    @@{centos.secret}@@
    </privateKey>
  </privateKeySource>
</com.cloudbees.jenkins.plugins.sshcredentials.impl.BasicSSHUserPrivateKey>' | sudo java -jar jenkins-cli.jar -s ${JENKINS_URL}  create-credentials-by-xml system::system::jenkins _ --username ${USERID}  --password @@{Jenkins_Master.authpwd}@@

  <mode>NORMAL</mode>
